tool_description: Discover the best ICO (initial coin offering) opportunities.
name: ICOWatchList
title: ICOWatchList

api_list.name: getAllICOs
api_list.description: Get all ICOs.To grab data about all the live, upcoming & finished ICOs.Limits: ICO Watch List API allow up to 1 request per second. We recommend to store the data feed on your own server if you expect large volumes of traffic.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ICOWatchListraygorodskijV1.p.rapidapi.com/getAllICOs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ICOWatchListraygorodskijV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
